short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Control your Roku with a web app.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Remoku is a network remote control for Roku streaming players, written in Javascript, CSS, and HTML5. This extension adds a shortcut icon to Chrome, that launches Remoku in a popup window.  You can control your Roku after setup using the on-screen icons, or with the keyboard.  See help.remoku.tv for more information.
